products.name: Pepsay
products.description: Nar 'ting better than a can a pepsay on a hot day, or a cold day, a rainy day or a foggy day! Much better than the other brand with the lard blessed polar bear. Made right here at the old 'Arvey place by me grandmudders.

products.name: Vienna Sausages
products.description: Is ya 'Ungry? I dies for some vienna sausages!

products.name: Newfie Steak
products.description: Nice and 'tick! Great fried up with a bit a beans!

products.name: Mustard Pickles
products.description: Some shockin' good me son, some shockin' good!

products.name: Darts
products.description: Got any smokes? We do! Just rolled them this mornin'. Sold individually. Don't tell me mudder I took her 'backy.

products.name: Who knit ya? Socks
products.description: Is ya froze da det? Get some hand made wool socks!

products.name: Ugly Sticks
products.description: No jig or reel is worth it's salt without one of these! Made with only the finest broom handles, boots and beer caps!

products.name: Whiskey in the Jar
products.description: Mush-a-rigum, durram-da. Whack-fol-the daddie-o, whack-fol-the daddie-o, there's whiskey in the jar

products.name: Sonny's Dreamcatcher
products.description: Sonny's dreams can't be real, they're just stories he's read. They're just stars in his eyes, they're just dreams in his head.
